member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX
member.summary: The MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX structure stores the extended statistics associated with a Multicast Forwarding Entry (MFE).

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.dwGroup
member.summary: The multicast group for this MFE. A value of zero indicates a wildcard group.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.dwSource
member.summary: The range of source addresses for this MFE. A value of zero indicates a wildcard source.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.dwSrcMask
member.summary: The IPv4 subnet mask that corresponds to dwSourceAddr. The dwSourceAddr and dwSourceMask members are used together to define a range of sources.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.dwUpStrmNgbr
member.summary: The upstream neighbor that is related to this MFE.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.dwInIfIndex
member.summary: The index of the incoming interface to which this MFE is related.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.dwInIfProtocol
member.summary: The routing protocol that owns the incoming interface to which this MFE is related.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.dwRouteProtocol
member.summary: The client that created the route.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.dwRouteNetwork
member.summary: The address associated with the route referred to by dwRouteProtocol.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.dwRouteMask
member.summary: The mask associated with the route referred to by dwRouteProtocol.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulUpTime
member.summary: The time, in 100ths of a seconds, since the MFE was created.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulExpiryTime
member.summary: The time, in 100ths of a seconds, until the MFE will be deleted. Zero is specified if the MFE is not subject to aging requirements.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulNumOutIf
member.summary: The number of interfaces in the outgoing interface list for this MFE.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulInPkts
member.summary: The number of packets that have been forwarded that matched this MFE.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulInOctets
member.summary: The number of octets of data forwarded that match this MFE.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulPktsDifferentIf
member.summary: The number of packets matching this MFE that were dropped due to an incoming interface check.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulQueueOverflow
member.summary: The number of packets matching this MFE that were dropped due to a queue overflow. There is one queue per MFE.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulUninitMfe
member.summary: The number of uninitialized packets that matched this MFE.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulNegativeMfe
member.summary: The number of packets matching this MFE discarded due to a negative error value.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulInDiscards
member.summary: The number of discarded forwarded packets that matched this MFE.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulInHdrErrors
member.summary: The number of packets matching this MFE discarded due to bad or malformed header values (such as a bad Time-to-Live value).

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_MFE_STATS_EX.ulTotalOutPackets
member.summary: The total number of MFE packets transmitted across all associated interfaces. Note that one packet sent over N interfaces will count as N packets within this value.
